description:
Go wanted to catch as many Pokémon as he could and one day while in a forest in the Kanto region, he caught every Bug type Pokémon native to Kanto. It was the last Pokémon he caught to complete the Kanto Bug dex as he had trouble`s capturing it the first time but with some encouragement from Ash and a battle with Go`s Scorbunny, Go was able to capture it. Scyther resides at a habitat at the Sakuragi Institute in Vermilion City.
In it`s first battle at the Battle Frontier Glass Noisemaker Cup, it was KO`d in one hit by Hoji`s Graena.
name: Strike (Gou)
